mapper.sql: ID, FEATURE_VALUE_NAME, FEATURE_VALUE_DESC, FEATURE_NAME, FEATURE_PUID, CFG0_MAIN_ITEM_PUID, H9FEATUREENNAME, FEATURE_DESC, CFG0_RELEVANCE, FEATURE_CREATOR, FEATURE_CREATE_DATE, FEATURE_LAST_MODIFIER, FEATURE_LAST_MODIFY_DATE, IS_FEATURE_SENT, IS_RELEVANCE_SENT, CFG_EFFECTED_DATE, CFG_ABOLISH_DATE, CFG_STATUS, CFG_IS_IN_PROCESS, CFG_PUID, PROCESS_START_DATE, PROCESS_STARTER, PROCESS_FINISH_DATE, PROCESS_FINISHER, PROCESS_STATUS, CHANGE_CREATE_DATE, VWO_ID

select
from ${tableName} t where t.cfg_puid=#{cfgPuid} and rownum <=1 order by t.change_create_date desc
